name: Perp88
introduce: Perp88 is a Decentralized Perpetual & Spot Exchange operating on Polygon. Users can open up to 88x leveraged long or short positions on the platform with ZERO slippage. Users can become market makers for traders at Perp88 by depositing eligible assets into the PLP fund, which functions as the liquidity for leveraged and spot traders at Perp88.
